readable.title: 2970461648_fe14ba0359
readable.content: A girl riding a scooter near the beach . a young child in a t-shirt on a bike stands in on a road in front of a beach , while others are on the sand near the water in the background . The child is riding a vehicle along a gated path next to a beach area . The girl rides at the ocean . The little child is holding the handles of something .
